patthana23.31:4.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.31:5.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.31:6.1: Naparittārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.31:6.3: … Ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare ekavīsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, natthiyā vigate ekavīsa.
